Text:
job well done 
but where are all your other torrents
something weird is happening in tpb 
half of my torrents are gone too...
:)

@ houruoha - in regards to torrents it is an internal issue with TPB. 
If you log out and log in you will see ALL your torrents listed.
There appears to have been a break in the link between the DB and the webserver pages.

I have no idea of TPB are going to 'eventually' rectify this issue.

Jon
